Text saved: Based on these results, we suggest that Girox Foods should use a management style that is more focused on its people. As part of this, we should look for ways to offer working hours that can be changed and also consider how we can allow employees to work from the locations they choose. Managers need to find different ways to challenge their staff, and they should also give more positive feedback and show they value the work that they do. Finally, spending more money on professional training could help create a positive atmosphere for employees so they can produce their best work. This training would be especially helpful in the area of social and cultural communication.
